tool_description: Analyzes candidate work history to determine experience levels, career progression, industry relevance, and role seniority with gap detection.

work_history.description: List of job positions with company names

job_titles.description: Job titles corresponding to work history

start_dates.description: Start dates for each position (ISO 8601 format)

end_dates.description: End dates for each position (ISO 8601 format, 'current' for ongoing)

target_role_level.description: Target seniority level (entry, mid, senior, executive)

error_messages: Mismatched array lengths: work_history, job_titles, start_dates, and end_dates must have equal lengths
Invalid date format: Use ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD) or 'current' for ongoing positions
Invalid date range: Start date must be before end date for each position
Invalid role level: Use one of [entry, mid, senior, executive]
Empty work history: At least one work experience entry is required
usage: Provide complete work history with corresponding titles and dates. Optionally specify target_industry and target_role_level for relevance scoring.

relevant_experience_years.description: Years of experience relevant to target industry/role

seniority_level.description: Assessed seniority level based on experience
